oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the dissipativity of uncontrollable systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CAMLIBEL, MK
WILLEMS, JC
BELUR, MN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: controllability
circuit theory
differential equations
problem solving
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper deals with dissipativity of uncontrollable linear time-invariant systems with quadratic supply rates and storage functions. A definition of dissipativity appropriate for this class of systems is given. We present a necessary and sufficient condition for dissipativeness in the single input/single output case.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the 42nd IEEE Conference on Decision and Control (V 2), Maui, Hawaii, USA, 9-12 December 2003, 1645-1650
